description: Podimarakkalage Tecla Dorine Perera and others Vs Kuruppu Arachchige Dona Jayawathie and others before D.N. Samarakoon, J
parties: Podimarakkalage Tecla Dorine Perera and others Vs Kuruppu Arachchige Dona Jayawathie and others
keywords: Finality of the Interlocutory Decree under section 48 of Partition Law No. 21 of 1977 - the District Court under section 48(4)(a)(iv) and (d) may grant special leave as provided, but cannot embark upon a full trial - special leave is given in 48(4)(d) for pleadings and any further pleadings "which are relevant to the claim set up in the petition only" - Decentralization of Civil Appellate jurisdiction has not affected the power of restitutio in integrum under Article 138 of the Constitution.
